note.p: Birth: Skreen, County Sligo, Ireland (13 August 1819)
Death: Cambridge (01 February 1903)
Burial: Mill Road cemetery, Cambridge
Research Field: Physics
Education: MA
Career: Fellow, Pembroke College, Cambridge; Lucasian Professor of Mathematics, University of Cambridge.
Honours: Bt 1889
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 5/06/1851
Medals/Prizes: Rumford Medal 1852; Copley Medal 1893
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 199-216, plate, signed by H
